special.name: (S) Draconic Tempest
special.description: Ryuu summons a storm of Scarlet Thunder, dealing 50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150 damage to all enemies and causing them to roll 1 fewer die for dodging for 2 turns.

passive.name: (P) Evasive Bolt
passive.description: Whenever Ryuu dodges, she creates energy that deals 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15 damage to the target enemy.

special.name: (S) Storm Surge
special.description: Naira conjures a surge of lightning, dealing 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 damage to all enemies and paralyzing them, reducing their dodge by 2 for 1 turn.

passive.name: (P) Lightning Shield
passive.description: Each time Naira takes damage, she reflects 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 damage back to the attacker.
